channel.title: I have a problem when I try to compile or run my server
channel.description: I got sources off of here, this is my first server and I've never had to deal with this stuff before but anyways, when I try to compile or run my server it says to me "Compiling please wait" "Cannot find the path specified." How do I fix this? Is my computer missing a program or something?

item.title: I have a problem when I try to compile or run my server
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Look in the download section, download Lin’s environmental variable setter, then you wont need to specify the path to javac, most people are unaware that you can just do “javac [args]” once your variables are set correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem when I try to compile or run my server

item.title: I have a problem when I try to compile or run my server
item.dc:creator: @ViBrAnT ViBrAnT
item.description:
@ViBrAnT wrote:

Okay. Thanks.

Also how do I change the ip on the client and source to my no IP adress?

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem when I try to compile or run my server

item.title: I have a problem when I try to compile or run my server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You should try to install JDK and set environmental variables.

Read full topic
